he shook himself -> and : 1
himself and we -> ducked : 1
and we ducked -> as : 1
we ducked as -> an : 1
ducked as an -> avalanche : 1
as an avalanche -> of : 1
an avalanche of -> snow : 1
avalanche of snow -> landed : 1
of snow landed -> on : 1
snow landed on -> the : 1
landed on the -> representatives : 1
on the representatives -> are : 1
the representatives are -> being : 1
representatives are being -> summoned : 1
are being summoned -> to : 1
being summoned to -> the : 1
summoned to the -> when : 1
to the when -> the : 1
the when the -> call : 1
when the call -> reaches : 1
the call reaches -> us : 1
call reaches us -> we : 1
reaches us we -> will : 1
us we will -> be : 1
will be materialized -> at : 1
be materialized at -> the : 1
materialized at the -> conference : 1
the conference and -> will : 1
conference and will -> be : 1
will be incommunicado -> for : 1
be incommunicado for -> its : 1
incommunicado for its -> nobody : 1
for its nobody -> had : 1
its nobody had -> mentioned : 1
nobody had mentioned -> that : 1
had mentioned that -> to : 1
mentioned that to -> children : 1
that to children -> are : 1
to children are -> due : 1
children are due -> this : 1
are due this -> he : 1
due this he -> go : 1
this he go -> esmeralda : 1
he go esmeralda -> said : 1
go esmeralda said -> jenny : 1
esmeralda said jenny -> clung : 1
said jenny clung -> tightly : 1
jenny clung tightly -> to : 1
clung tightly to -> me : 1
tightly to me -> as : 1
to me as -> if : 1
if to physically -> prevent : 1
to physically prevent -> me : 1
physically prevent me -> from : 1
prevent me from -> long : 1
me from long -> does : 1
from long does -> the : 1
long does the -> conference : 1
does the conference -> pulled : 1
the conference pulled -> his : 1
conference pulled his -> communicating : 1
pulled his communicating -> he : 1
his communicating he -> looked : 1
communicating he looked -> last : 1
he looked last -> conference : 1
looked last conference -> lasted : 1
last conference lasted -> five : 1
conference lasted five -> began : 1
lasted five began -> to : 1
five began to -> fade : 1
began to fade -> and : 1
to fade and -> i : 1
fade and i -> could : 1
i could no -> longer : 1
could no longer -> feel : 1
no longer feel -> jenny : 1
longer feel jenny -> holding : 1
feel jenny holding -> onto : 1
jenny holding onto -> the : 1
holding onto the -> world : 1
onto the world -> became : 1
the world became -> grey : 1
world became grey -> and : 1
became grey and -> i : 1

i was hurtling -> through : 1

hurtling through the -> mists : 1
through the mists -> of : 1

hop morrissey will -> return : 1
